alert.note: Alert for Hardin (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued September 14 at 2:03PM CDT until September 14 at 3:45PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 PM CDT THIS AFTERNOON FOR SOUTHWESTERN HARDIN COUNTY... At 203 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain has ended across the warned area. However flash flooding remains likely. Between 2 and 5 inches of rain have fallen. Additional rainfall amounts up to 0.3 inches are possible in the warned area. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Sour Lake and Batson. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
